The photo was taken in Zurich: Switzerland, in August 2019 during the 28th annual techno Street Parade, not in Berlin during a COVID-19 protest.
The photo shows a crowd of partygoers at: a techno music event, and is being misused online to depict a COVID-19 protest.
The image was flagged by Facebook as par: 4. German police estimated that at least 17,000 people participated in a COVID-19 protest in Berlin on August 1, 2020, but the photo in question does not depict that event.
